biography_text: PENCE, Gregory,  (brother of Mike Pence), a Representative from Indiana; born in Columbus, Bartholomew County, Ind., November 14, 1956; graduated from Columbus North High School, Columbus, Ind., 1975; B.A., Loyola University, Chicago, Ill., 1979; M.B.A., Loyola University, Chicago, Ill., 1985; United States Marine Corps., 1979-1983; engaged in the oil industry; retail consultant; small business owner; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
